GnssSignalConfiguration
GnssSignalConfiguration
Types
GpsSignal

Available GPS signals.

L1CA

0x01 - L1CA: 00000001

L2C

0x02 - L2C:  00000010

L5

0x04 - L5:  00000100

GlonassSignal

Available GLONASS signals.

L1OF

0x01 - L1OF: 00000001

L2OF

0x02 - L2OF: 00000010

GalileoSignal

Available Galileo signals.

E1

0x01 - E1:  00000001

E5B

0x02 - E5B: 00000010

E5A

0x04 - E5A: 00000100

BeiDouSignal

Available BeiDou signals.

B1

0x01 - B1:  00000001

B2

0x02 - B2:  00000010

B2A

0x04 - B2A: 00000100
